description:
- Quick start to learn the mother of all langauges...Arabic!

- A power point presentation for the 28 letters of Arabic Alphabet.

- you will get to know each letter how it is pronounced and its shape in the word (Beginning, Middle and at the end).

- Maximum time for every lesson is 3 minutes.

- This course is aimed at those who want to take first step towards learning how to read and speak Arabic.
title: Learn Arabic by Words
